Restore_Essence.help: Should you fall in battle, you can Restore your Essence and bring yourself from the brink of death. You will revive with most of your Hit Points and half your Endurance and be protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Restore_Essence.attackerHit: You {PowerName} yourself from the brink of death. You feel weak and cannot do anything for a while.

Proton_Scatter.help: The Proton Scatter has reduced your Defense.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Luminous_Detonation.help: The Luminous Detonation has reduced your Defense.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Incandescent_Strike.help: The Incandescent Strike has locked you in position. You cannot move and your Defense is reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Shining_Shield.help: When you toggle on your Shining Shield, you create an energy barrier that grants you high resistance to Smashing and Lethal damage. Recharge: Fast
Shining_Shield.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Bright_Nova.help: Kheldians are masters of energy and matter. A Peacebringer can transform into a flying energy beast known as a Bright Nova. When you choose this power, you will have access to 4 very powerful ranged attacks that can only be used while in this form. You will not be able to use any other powers while in Bright Nova form. Bright Nova can fly, has increased Accuracy, and improved Endurance Recovery, but has no defense. Recharge: Fast
